Key Match Events: Denis Undav scored twice for Germany in the 2-1 win over Bosnia-Herzegovina
Edin Dzeko scored for Bosnia-Herzegovina 20 minutes from time
Florian Wirtz and Maximilian Mittelst√§dt contributed to Germany's goals
Pre-Game Insights: Germany started a new cycle after the retirements of Manuel Neuer and Toni Kroos
Germany had plenty of chances to score more but had a couple of goals disallowed for offside
Bosnia's Ermedin Demirovic hit the woodwork in the 35th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann acknowledged the team's chances and the spirited defense of Bosnia
Netherlands coach Ronald Koeman expressed relief after a man down, they still managed a draw
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary's Roland Sallai put them in the driver's seat in the 32nd with a close-range finish
The Dutch looked set for a dreadful evening when defender Virgil van Dijk was sent off for a second yellow card
Turkey defeated Montenegro 1-0 in the other Group B4 game
